meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The titchy kitten fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The ladybug is so titchy that it can sit on a leaf.
meanings.sent3: The titchy ant tried to lift a crumb bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her titchy voice was barely audible over the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The titchy pebble sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: An object or person that is small or insignificant.
meanings.sent1: I found a titchy pebble in my shoe after the walk.
meanings.sent2: The titchy flower in the garden caught my eye.
meanings.sent3: The titchy squirrel tried to climb the giant tree.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a titchy fish in a big pond.
meanings.sent5: The titchy star shone brightly in the night sky.
